answers.A: Every region has at least two AZs and each AZ is isolated but inter-connected with low-latency dedicated connectivity
answers.B: Every region may have one or more AZs and each AZ is isolated but inter-connected with low-latency dedicated connectivity
answers.C: Every region has at least two AZs and each AZ is isolated but inter-connected through the internet
answers.D: Every region consists of only one AZ that automatically provides highly-available infrastructures
